title: Is it possible to study 3 subjects in a month? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes everything is possible because impossible also tells I m possible. There are 8 subject when I am in 10th I read it in 1 month and not in full year . I maintain my schedule. And get 84.76 percent in 10th . So you will get more from me. As you only have three subject. The only thing is you have to maintain your schedule. And you will get success. Thanks for reading my answer. Hope you like it. Byeee

I can say Yes and even more than that!It’s just required proper time management. Try “Super Scholar” APP - it’s has all subjects, topics and grades you need.Super Scholar - school quiz and tutor USA - Apps on Google Play
